description.value:
You briefly conjure an eikon, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name and legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned eikon occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the eikon below to summon.

  • Diabolos Speed 100 feet, fly 50 feet; Arrive (shadow) Ruinous Omen Each foe in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100] takes @Damage[16d8[void]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save; Depart (incapacitation, gravity) Dark Messenger Each foe in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] loses half their current hit points, rounded down, unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] save. If a foe has 50 hit points of fewer, it dies instantly on a failure or critical failure.
  • Alexander, the Creator Speed 80 feet, fly 200 feet; Arrive (holy) Sacrament Alexander shoots four @Template[type:line|distance:600|width:20]{600-foot lines} of divine light, each as wide as Alexander itself, one from each cardinal direction. The lines can't overlap. Each foe along one of the lines takes @Damage[6d12[vitality]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save. On a failure, the foe is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round (or for 1 minute on a critical failure); Depart (holy) Divine Judgment Each foe within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100] takes @Damage[6d10[vitality]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save, and is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} on a failure.
  • Phoenix Speed 30 feet, fly 200 feet; Arrive (fire) Phoenix Flame Phoenix descends from the sky where it was summoned, causing all foes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] to take @Damage[8d12[fire]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save; Depart (fire, healing) Flames of Rebirth Phoenix vanishes in a burst of soothing flame. All allies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] are healed for @Damage[14d12[healing]] hit points, and remove any instances of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} conditions they may have (except for permanent stacks of doomed).
  • Bahamut Speed 100 feet, fly 100 feet; Arrive (auditory, mental) Cry of the Fallen Moon Bahamut manifests with an earth-shaking roar, requiring all foes within @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} who can hear him to attempt a @Check[will|against:spell] save, leaving them @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 3} on a failure; Depart (unaspected) Teraflare Bahamut unleashes his scorching breath in a @Template[type:cone|distance:120]. Each foe in the area takes @Damage[10d12[force]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save.
  • Hades Speed 50 feet, fly 50 feet, burrow 50 feet; Arrive (mental) Black Cauldron Hades' foul presence pollutes magic around him. Each of your enemies within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] that are under the effects of a spell must attempt a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] save. On a failure, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}. Any of your enemies that @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casts a Spell} within 60 feet of Hades must attempt a Fortitude save with the same effects unless it's already stupefied; Depart (poison) Titanomachy Each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] takes @Damage[10d6[void],10d6[poison]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save.
  • Ark Speed 20 feet, fly 200 feet, swim 100 feet; Arrive (fire, shadow) Designation: Blasty Ark fires countless beams, targeting each of your enemies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:200]{200 feet} of it. The beams deal @Damage[5d6[fire],5d6[void]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save; Depart (shadow) Eternal Darkness Chilling black mist surges out in a @Template[type:burst|distance:100] centered on Ark and remains for 1 minute. This mist has the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Mist} spell, plus any foe within the area at the end of its turn takes @Damage[5d6[void]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save.
  • Knights of the Round Speed 75 feet, fly 100 feet; Arrive (teleportation) Ascalonâ€™s Might Each foe in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:50] is pushed 100 feet away unless it succeeds at a @Check[fortitude|against:spell] save. Foes additionally take @Damage[10d6[bludgeoning]] damage, regardless of the result of their save; Depart Ultimate End Each foe in a @Template[type:burst|distance:100] centered on the Knights of the Round takes @Damage[12d8[slashing]] damage with a @Check[fortitude|against:spell|basic] save.

duration.value: until the end of your next turn
